thread.section_title: Archer Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfectly located, slept great!
thread.title_full: Perfectly located, slept great! - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Adam a
title: Perfectly located, slept great!
text:
Stayed at the archer hotel in the beginning of March and I have almost no complaints. A very lively area in Manhattan with a lot of things to do on walking distance. My brother and I each had a queen bed and it couldnt have been more comfortable.
My only minor issue was the water temperature in the shower. It wasn't warm enough for my liking.
Service was excellent
